message:
Thankfully someone spoke up when something didn't seem right.
"FBI alerted Columbia police after receiving an anonymous tip that a minor was being left in a Welcome Inn hotel room with strange men for long periods of time."

data.description: COLUMBIA, Mo. -- A Missouri mother who police say let men have sex with her 14-year-old daughter, who authorities say has the mental abilities of a 2- or 3-year-old, in exchange for drugs and money was charged Tuesday, according to the Columbia Daily Tribune. Renee M. Collins, 49, faces charges of s...
data.title: Mother charged with sex trafficking disabled teen daughter
